EnglishUK.verification_token_invalid: Failed to verify your account, you have provided an invalid token.
EnglishUK.verification_not_used: Cannot verify your account, you provided a verification token for a website that does not use this bot.
EnglishUK.verification_error: An error occured while trying to verify your account.
EnglishUK.verification_success: Thank you for verifying, your account is now linked.
EnglishUK.link_guild_saving: The API URL and Guild ID you sent were valid. Saving now...
EnglishUK.link_guild_success: Your API URL has been linked to "%s".
EnglishUK.link_guild_failed_no_url: Failed: `You need to provide a NamelessMC API URL`.
EnglishUK.link_guild_failed_db: Failed: `Your API URL could not be saved.`
EnglishUK.link_guild_failed_api_disabled:
Error: `%s`.
Please ensure your API is enabled in `StaffCP - Configuration - API`.
EnglishUK.link_guild_failed_no_guilds: Error: `You are not the owner of a Guild with the Nameless Link bot.`
EnglishUK.link_guild_failed_multiple:
Error: `You are the owner of multiple Guilds with the Nameless Link bot Please specify a Guild ID as the second argument.
Available Guilds:
%s`
EnglishUK.guild_join_success: Hello! Thank you for using the NamelessMC Bot. To get started, reply with `!url ` followed by your API URL found in `StaffCP -> Configuration -> API`.
EnglishUK.guild_join_failed_db: Hello! Thank you for using the NamelessMC Bot. I tried to setup your guild, but failed.
EnglishUK.guild_join_needs_renew: Hello! Thank you for using the NamelessMC Bot. It looks like you have already set your API URL, but it is no longer functional. Please reply with `!url ` followed by your API URL found in `StaffCP -> Configuration -> API`.
EnglishUK.guild_join_welcome_back: Hello! Thank you for using the NamelessMC Bot. It looks like you have already set your API URL. Welcome back.
